CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 15, 1958, page A19, reads: "Crowning New 'Queen' - Mrs. Nellie Bryant, third from left, was crowned the new 'queen' of the Home Mission Department during the 112th annual session of the AME Zion Allegheny Conference, held recently, at John Wesley Church, by reporting $130 for missions. Others in the picture are, left to right: Mrs. Ellen Johnson, Mrs. Arrelia Davis, who won the crown for 12 consecutive years; Mrs. Bryant, Mrs. Willa Mae Rice, Episcopal supervisor, who conducted the coronation; Bishop W. C. Brown, Mrs. Mozelle Irvin, Mrs. Maggie Johnson, Mrs. Jessie Henderson, district president, and Mrs. Lucinda Harper, conference president. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait, left to right: Ellen Johnson, Arrelia Davis, Nellie Bryant, wearing crown, light colored robe, holding bouquet, Willa Mae Rice, Bishop W. C. Brown, Mozelle Irvin, Maggie Johnson, Jessie Henderson, and Lucinda Harper, posed in John Wesley AME Zion Church for the crowning of the new 'queen' of the Home Mission Department during the 112th annual session of the AME Zion Allegheny Conference, another version
